paragraph.paragraph: This section of the documentation explains all of the other project related configuration properties, configurable through the Visual Studio .NET ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfPropertyBrowser.htm properties window .

project_node.xml Project Properties
The project properties displayed in the properties window. For project build configuration properties, see ../index.xmlConfiguring EiffelEnvision Projects.

references_folder.xml References Folder Properties
The EiffelEnvision project References folder properties.

reference.xml Reference Item Properties
The properties for all reference items under the References folder

project_items.xml Project Items Folder Properties
The EiffelEnvision project Project Items folder properties.

clusters.xml Explicit Cluster Folder Properties
The properties related to explicitly added cluster folders. See ../../../structure/project_items/clusters_and_items/explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folders for more information on explicitly added cluster folders.

cluster_folders.xml Cluster Folder Properties
The properties related to cluster folders included under a recursive cluster. See ../../../structure/project_items/clusters_and_items/cluster_folders.xmlCluster Folders for more information on implicitly added cluster folders.

eiffel_classes.xml Eiffel Class Item Properties
The properties related to the ../../../structure/project_items/clusters_and_items/cluster_enumeration.xmlautomatically added Eiffel class source files.

file_items.xml File Item Properties
The properties related to all non-Eiffel class source file items.

eiffel_libraries.xml Eiffel Libraries Folder Properties
The properties related to the EiffelEnvision Eiffel Libraries folder.

other_project_items.xml Other Project Items Folder Properties
The properties related to the EiffelEnvision Other Project Items folder.

virtual_folders.xml Virtual Folder Properties
The properties related to the all virtual folders located under the Other Project Items folder.
